chaps.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: protective leather covers worn over your trousers when riding a horse
chaps.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: (Clearing House Automated Payment System) an electronic system that is used to transfer (=move) money from one bank account to another by computer
chaps.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: abbreviation for CLEARING HOUSE AUTOMATED PAYMENT SYSTEM
